page.title: 12LEISURE-TIME AT COMMONSIDE
page.content: FOR A SMALL POPULATION THERE'S A WIDE RANGE OF RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES PURSUED RANGING FROM HUNTING, FISHING & SHOOTING TO DOG BREEDING, GARDENING & DOMINOES! THE BUCCLEUCH HUNT COVERS THE LAND ON THE NORTH OF THE RIVER TEVIOT WHILE THE LIDDESDALE HUNTS OVER THAT TO THE SOUTH. PERMITS ARE REQUIRED TO FISH THE TEVIOT. TWO SYNDICATES LEASE THE GROUSE & PHEASANT SHOOTING FROM THE BUCCLEUCH ESTATES. RIDING IS ANOTHER PURSUIT PRACTISED WITHIN THIS BLOCK, DARTS & DOMINOES TOO. MANY PEOPLE WHO LIVE HERE HAVE TO TRAVEL TO TAKE PART IN ACTIVITIES WHICH APPEAL TO THEM - PIPING, SQUASH, SWIMMING, INDOOR BOWLS & KEEP FIT IN HAWICK & LATTER IN NEWMILL HALL, RUGBY IN SELKIRK & FIDDLING IN LANGHOLM. HOME-BASED ACTIVITIES INCLUDE READING, ENTERTAINING, PHOTOGRAPHY, COMPUTER & BOARD GAMES, CARDS, & GOAT REARING.
